name: firebase-functions

scripts.build:pack: rm -rf lib && npm install && node_modules/.bin/tsc -p tsconfig.release.json && npm pack
scripts.build:release: npm install --production && npm install typescript firebase-admin && node_modules/.bin/tsc -p tsconfig.release.json
